summary:
This Mod adds a new Craftingarea to Breezehome in Whiterun. The new room is accessible without loading a new cell (no Loadingscreen).
Work in Progress
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[IMG]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120217/kc38hooa.png[/IMG]

This Mod adds a new Craftingarea to Breezehome in Whiterun. The new room is accessible without loading a new cell (no Loadingscreen).

SOORY FOR MY BAD ENGLISH!!! :-)

[IMG]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120217/gxtgmfmz.png[/IMG]

It has always bothered me to move between Whiterun and BreezeHome to craft something. Because i can\'t carry much as i want, i decidet, to make a mod containing a crafting area. This way i don\'t have 100 loadingscreens, while crafting 5 Items.

Please Endorse if you like it or post your comments to let me know, what\'s wrong.


[IMG]http://s1.directupload.net/images/120217/vylskmiq.png[/IMG]

v1.1 

- Fixed one chest position
- added some decoration
- changed lights
- addet some furniture

v1.2

- addet Alchemy & Enchanting-Table

v1.3

- added 2 new chest
- added 1 Jewel Case
- added Alcemy & Enchanting-Cases
- added some Deco

v1.4

- added 2 Weapon-Plaques
- added 1 Weapon-Rack
- added 1 Mannequin

v1.5

- addet a new SELFMADE Smelter (Created with Cinema4D & Mudbox)

v1.6

- added Soem Deco & Furniture to Smelter-Area
- added 1 more Chest


[IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/120217/3tao6d97.png[/IMG]

Delete the vanilla Alchemy-Room to add a little \"Museum\" with Mannequins and Racks etc.

[u]KNOWN ISSUES:[/u]
First time loading 1.4 it can happen, the manequin is walking around like a NPC. In this case just leave and reenter Breezehome.
(If there is anybody out there who knows how to fix this, please feel free to share with me.)

[IMG]http://s1.directupload.net/images/120217/n4hcq25z.png[/IMG]
__________

[IMG]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120217/bwy6g8bp.png[/IMG]

- NOT compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9755]Breezehome Renovation with Bathroom[/url]
- Full compatible with \"Dovahkiin Hideout\"[/center]
author: Insane26
